title.rendered: Handshake Reviews and Peer to Peer Advising with University of Miami

content.rendered: View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: In this session, participants will learn about the University of Miami’s unique usage of the a peer career studio which allows staff to scale services and engage more groups of students than was previously possible. Guests will also learn how the team further engages students with Handshake peer learning tools like Reviews.
